name: Maze Parking: Driving Skill
description:
Maze Parking: Driving Skill is giving you the opportunity to a combined thrill of racing against the time and finding the parking in a maze shaped puzzle track. You can select any of the speed champions of cars and choose the level in this extreme speed car race. The objective is simply to find and reach your parking spot located within the maze track. The game is a race against time with the penalty of losing time as you hit the walls or objects placed on the track.

Features:
• Great Graphics
• Easy Controls
• Realistic physics
• Absorbing gameplay
• Realistic controls over environment
• Easy and free to use
• Offline Game Play
